props.fixedFooter: Use the fixed-footer prop together with the height prop to fix the footer to the bottom of the table.
props.fixedHeader: Use the fixed-header prop together with the height prop to fix the header to the top of the table.
props.height: Use the height prop to set the height of the table.
props.hover: Will add a hover effect to a table's row when the mouse is over it.
props.striped: Applies a background to either **even** or **odd** rows.

slots.bottom: Slot to add content below the table.
slots.top: Slot to add content above the table.
slots.wrapper: Slots for custom rendering of the table wrapper.
